name: @usecapsule/monitor-service
description: Observability and telemetry bounded context providing comprehensive monitoring, logging, and tracing capabilities for the Capsule platform. This service implements the complete observability stack including metrics collection via Prometheus, log aggregation through Loki, distributed tracing with OpenTelemetry, and cost analytics for resource optimization. It automatically instruments deployed applications without requiring code changes, generates Grafana dashboards, configures intelligent alerts, and provides real-time performance insights. The service uses TimescaleDB for efficient time-series data storage, handling millions of metrics points per second while maintaining query performance. It processes observability data through RabbitMQ events, aggregates metrics across services, correlates logs with traces, and provides the data foundation for Capsule's cost tracking and optimization features. All monitoring configurations, alert rules, and historical metrics are owned and managed within this bounded context.
author: Witek Team
